r.d: This package supports you to localize your applications. Multiple ways of supporting translation are implemented and methods to determine the current users (browser-)language. Localizing Numbers, DateTime and currency is also implemented.
r.n: * added singleton() method to DateTime, Number and Currency * added russian support by Antony Dovgal * added slovenian support by Matej Dakol * added portugese by Bruno Pedro * hungarian by Kov√°cs Gergely * nl+nl_NL Jeroen Houben * fixed July misspelling + da_DK by Tommy Ipsen
